answers.answer: Hi Cherry,What does your doc say about all the symptoms you have been experiencing? I know that being diabetic can cause some of the symptoms that people with MS experience if your diabetes is not under control.What kind of symptoms have you been having that would make your family go on the internet to investigate?There are many steps to take in diagnosing MS so it could be a long venture for you but hopefully you will get an answer soon.Welcome to the forum,Paula

You really need to make an appointment with your doctor and let him know all that is happening to you.  Then he can order tests for you and refer you if needed.I hope you are able to get this worked out.Red

question: i am a 34 year old female who has a 21/2 year old child i have been trying to get my doc to see if i have ms all the sights my family keep looking at the past 5 years at some point have had almost all of the signs can i just go to the er myself i am diabetic have been for 20 years and have many side effects due to unhealthy living for 15 years please can someone help me
title: help me
